mapper.insert: insert into MEMBER_TBL_02(custno,custname, phone, zipcode, address, address2,joindate, grade, city, id, password ) values (#{custno} ,#{custname}, #{phone}, #{zipcode}, #{address}, #{address2},#{joindateStr}, #{grade}, #{city}, #{id}, #{password} )
mapper.update: update MEMBER_TBL_02 set custname=#{custname}, phone=#{phone}, zipcode=#{zipcode}, address=#{address}, address2=#{address2}, joindate=#{joindateStr}, grade=#{grade}, city=#{city} where custno =#{custno}
mapper.select:
select * from MEMBER_TBL_02 where 1=1
and custname like '%'||#{ch2}||'%'
and phone like '%'||#{ch2}||'%'
and address like '%'||#{ch2}||'%'
order by custno desc
select id from MEMBER_TBL_02 where id=#{id}

select m1.custno , custname, grade, nvl(sum(price),0) price from MEMBER_TBL_02 m1 left join MONEY_TBL_02 m2 on m1.CUSTNO = m2.CUSTNO group by m1.custno, custname, grade having sum(price) >= 3000 order by price DESC
